Class.name: MX.impl
Class.Description:
Business logic class defined by OpenAPI in MX.spec
Updated Apr 13, 2020 13:42:29

Parameter.name: ExposeServerExceptions
Parameter.Description: If ExposeServerExceptions is true, then details of internal errors will be exposed.

Method.name: ping
Method.Description: This request returns a reply message in response to a /ping request.
Method.Implementation: Do ..%SetStatusCode(200) x "o 2:(1:1) u 2 zw c 2 u $p" s %=0,ooo="" f n=0:1 s %=$o(^SPOOL(1,%)) q:%>999999!'% s ooo=ooo_$g(^(%)) Quit $h_"-Reply from MX-"_ooo_-$j

Method.name: vmx
Method.Description: This request returns a reply message in response to a /vmx request.
Method.Implementation: Do ..%SetStatusCode(200) ; s usermx=$g(%request.Data("usermx",1)) s:"u"[usermx usermx=$replace(%request.CgiEnvs("REMOTE_ADDR"),".","") s nspace=%request.Data("nspace",1) s %o=$p($g(%request.CgiEnvs("QUERY_STRING")),"mumps=",2,999) s %o=$replace(%o,"%20"," "),%o=$replace(%o,"%23","#"),%o=$replace(%o,"%22","""") s mumps=%o if mumps="CLOSE" Quit "HALT"_-$j ; x "o 2:($j:101) u 2 zw %request c 2 u $p" k ^SPOOL($j) s ^ERR=mumps s %flagREST=$j o 2:($j:1):"^MXterm" u 2:($j:1):"^MXterm" s ooo=$$rest^MX1(usermx,nspace,mumps) close 2 Quit $h_-$j_" %zt="_$g(%zt)_"- from csp/MX/vmx - "_usermx_" "_nspace_" [["_$e(ooo,1,32765+1000)

XData.name: OpenAPI
